text: Ara, tadera nabi taderake balechilena, tara rajatbera nidarsana e'i ye, tomadera nikata tabuta [1] asabe yate tomadera raba-era nikata hate prasanti ebam musa o haruna bansiyagana ya parityaga kareche tara abasistansa thakabe; pheresatagana ta bahana kare anabe. Tomara yadi mumina ha'o tabe niscaya'i tomadera jan'ya ete nidarsana rayeche.â€™
